subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: With Hank Haney stepping down as Tiger Woods’s personal coach, sparing player and coach weeks of awkwardness as Woods reconfigures his game and moves on to another tutor — the next question becomes who will supplant Haney.
snippet: With Hank Haney stepping down as Tiger Woods’s personal coach, sparing player and coach weeks of awkwardness as Woods reconfigures his game and moves on to another tutor — the next question becomes who will supplant Haney.
